title: Breakfast
description: Wake up with your Size fam and grab the most important meal of the day! Enjoy breakfast along with fellow attendees at the hotel restaurant.

title: Opening Ceremony
description: Size Con's Official kick-off ceremony with short speeches by those behind this one-of-a-kind event!

title: Vendor Hall
description: Come and checkout the many amazing, unique and risqué goods sold by our talented creators and performers! Commission artists and talent alike, buy artwork and sizey products, and don’t forget to see what exciting services and demos are available!

title: Newbie Social
description: Across the country, and even abroad, we've all gathered here today because we all have one thing in common: OUR LOVE OF SIZE! What brought you to Size Con this year? What do you hope to gain from your time here? Mingle with fellow Size fans and let's get rid of those Size-Con jitters together! 😎

title: Size Language 101
description: The language we use to describe our size interests is incredibly varied. This panel discusses common and differing terms we use for our size interests.

title: The Fluffy Feels Social
description: Sometimes we just want to enjoy Size-play without the sex. Gather together to have a lighter, fluffier, and more traditionally romantic side of Size!

title: Lunch
description: Take a break and grab some grub! Enjoy lunch with fellow attendees at the hotel restaurant.

title: Ace Panel
description: Diving into Asexuality and Size!

title: Size Support Social
description: We know. We're sometimes a lot to deal with. But we know you love us, because you're here at SizeCon celebrating with us! If you are not a size fan but here to support someone, stop by this social to speak with other folks who are also in relationships with a size partner or partners! Share experiences, tips, vent, etc. You are part of the community too, so feel free to participate in a casual, private setting, in a space just for you!

title: Size Wars
description: Come one, come all, to Size Con’s premiere gaming event! Compete with other attendees to be the champion of Size Wars!

title: Ace Social
description: A gathering for all ace size fans! Come share your experiences and meet others just like you!

title: Sizey Songs and Macro Music Videos
Size-Fur Panel
description: A panel discussing the popular crossroads of furry and size content!

title: Hungry Hunks Social
description: Rumbly bellies make you weak, open maws make you moan, and the thought of being swallowed by a sexy Giant guy drives you crazy! Vore fans unite and discuss hungry hunks who can't get enough tiny snacks like you! Hungry giants and foolish prey welcome.

title: Extreme Size Panel
description: A discussion on sizes that fringe on planetary to microscopic.

title: BDSM 101
description: A thorough rundown of BDSM and D/s practices, terminology, and events outside of Size Con to explore your own Power-Play fantasies.

title: Tall Tails Social
description: Furries unite! The furry-size community is robust, unique and growing! Let's discuss our love of size, paws, tails and sharp maws included!

title: Size & Self Discovery Panel
description: Perspectives on how creating, engaging, and just existing in the world of size shapes identity, through the lenses of gender, sexuality, and everything else. Presented by Didi Star!

title: Size Wars
description: Come one, come all, to Size Con’s premiere gaming event! Compete with other attendees to be the champion of Size Wars!

title: Male Expansion Social
description: For fans of dudes expanding and/or putting on muscle - come sit and discuss how your interests came to be and how you enjoy them today!

title: Dinner
description: Take a break and grab some grub! Enjoy dinner with fellow attendees at the hotel restaurant.

title: Microphile Panel
description: This panel is all about those who like to grow to giant sizes or shrink others! Come join the discussion with our diverse group of panelists!

title: Weight Gain Bazaar
description: Come one, come all! Pick up your BIG BUCKS at the Weight Gain Bazaar and help one lucky lady grow exponentially bigger, better and sexier!

title: Breast Expansion Social
description: For fans of breasts that keep getting bigger and bigger (...and bigger). Come sit and discuss how your interests came to be and how you enjoy them today!

title: Welcome to the Darkside Panel
description: Not for the faint of heart! This panel is for fans of size-related cruel delights. This panel will discuss size alongside BDSM and embracing your sexuality.

title: Radio Play Event
description: Brought to you by Praedatorius.

title: Ass Expansion Social
description: If you're fascinated by body parts swelling out of proportion or love seeing characters inflated like balloons, this is the panel for you! Baby got back! For fans of booties that keep getting bigger and bigger and bi-- well you get the picture.

title: Gulliveria Café
description: Thirsty? Join us for an unforgettable Giantess experience at our new and improved interactive Role-Play and Variety Cafe Show experience! We'll be featuring several acts by our crew of stunning Giantess performers - Entry is free, so don't miss it! Complementary Tea or Coffee is available if you can show our Giantess servers that you are worthy. Tips appreciated, space is limited!

title: Darkside Social
description: Not for the faint of heart! This social is for lovers of size-related cruel delights - violence, humiliation, death who want to discuss it in a more intimate setting.

title: SizeCon Karaoke Club 🎵
description: Get in touch with your inner diva or rockstar! If you’ve never tried karaoke before you will not regret it! Everyone welcome regardless of experience and a great way to connect with everyone after a busy first day of Sizecon!

title: Breakfast
description: Wake up with your Size fam and grab the most important meal of the day! Enjoy breakfast along with fellow attendees at the hotel restaurant.

title: Vendor Hall
description: Come and checkout the many amazing, unique and risqué goods sold by our talented creators and performers! Commission artists and talent alike, buy artwork and sizey products, and don’t forget to see what exciting services and demos are available!

title: Making Macro Art 101
description: Professional artist Matthew Huntley teaches the fundamental concepts and techniques needed to draw, paint, and illustrate anything from the extremely huge to the extremely small, and everything in between. No experience required!

title: ⚣ WLW Social 🏳️‍🌈
description: Welcome to the Women love Women social - A space at Size Con for women to talk to other women about their love for growing, shrinking and/or expanding ladies!

title: Underfoot Social
description: Whether manicured or hairy, platformed or stinky, this is the one social dedicated to our Foot worshippers! Come and discuss your love of Size and Feet!

title: SizeCon Escape the Room
description: Back by popular demand, enjoy a whole brand-new puzzle, brought to you by our puzzle master Scidram (a.k.a. Syrus Durham)! Who's willing to take a fantastic voyage and solve this oversized mystery? Can it be done in forty-five minutes before the reduction process reverts? Come to SizeCon 2023 and find out!

title: Intro into Sexual Health
description: Sexual health is a far more expansive topic than the US education system prefers to present. The World Health Organization has identified 19 different aspects of sexual health, and we only typically scratch the surface of it, mostly because we tend to focus on risk management and pleasure, physical and/or psychological. Come sit in with me and broaden your perspectives on you and your partners' sexual health. Presented by Alex Fort.

title: Real-Life Expansion
description: Expansion fans rejoice! Whether its a padded muscle suit or a specially designed Breast Expansion rig, join in as several prop creators put their heads together and discuss different ways to approach creating costuming solutions towards all sorts of fantasies. We just may have a few supplies to share, for those interested in learning a bit about constructing new props themselves. Get ready for some BIG surprises including a live saline infusion!

title: A Tour of the Erotic Edge
description: Meet Yale-Trained Anthropologist and Author Katharine Gates as she tells the stories behind her popular book Deviant Desires: A Tour of the Erotic Edge.

title: Size Ladies Social
description: Join a space only for women to share your experiences and discuss the joys, stresses, and triumphs of being a woman in the size community.

title: ⚣ MLM Social 🏳️‍🌈
description: Welcome to the Men love Men social - A space at Size Con for men to talk to other men about their love for growing, shrinking and/or expanding dudes!

title: Lunch
description: Take a break and grab some grub! Enjoy lunch with fellow attendees at the hotel restaurant.

title: Kink IRL: Fighting Shame and Finding Love
description: A curated presentation for Size kinksters about fighting shame, finding validation, coming out to your partner, communicating with your partner, and practicing your size kink in the bedroom. Presented by Jitensha.

title: Drawing Inflation
description: Presented by Mabo Corescant!

title: Relationships Panel
description: This panel, run by couples, shares their experience in size dynamics and relationships: advice on coming out to a partner and sharing your desires with someone.

title: Size Wars
description: Come one, come all, to Size Con’s premiere gaming event! Compete with other attendees to be the champion of Size Wars!

title: Blueberry Social
description: For those who like them round, juicy blueberries - come sit and discuss how your interests came to be and how you enjoy them today!

title: D&D Campaign
description: There’s treasure to be grabbed, monsters to tackle, and traps to avoid, but this time our party of adventurers is going to have to deal with a different scale of challenge. Back by popular demand, join some of the best GMs from within the Size community to roll some dice and see just how dangerous a few magic spells in the wrong hands can be! Spots do fill up, so we highly suggest to sign up before the event.

title: Inflation, Expansion & Hyper Panel
description: If you're fascinated by body parts swelling out of proportion or love seeing characters inflated like balloons, this is the panel for you!

title: Partnered Social
description: A social for folks who are currently in relationships, this is a space to connect and share with others about how size impacts the dynamics of our deepest intimacies.

title: Hungry Hunnies
description: Being swallowed by a sexy Giantess drives you crazy! Vore fans unite to discuss hungry hunnies who love tiny snacks! Hungry Giantesses and foolish prey welcome.

title: Macrophile Panel
description: This panel is all about those who love Giants and Giantesses! Come join the discussion with our diverse group of panelists!

title: Talent Q&A Panel
description: Hear straight from your favorite adult performers about what it’s like, what it takes and why they chose career paths in adult film making. Make sure to bring your questions to our talented panelists!

title: Trans Size Social 🏳️‍⚧️
description: This social is for those in the community who are Transgender and want to share their own unique life experiences and size fantasies.

title: Dinner
description: Take a break and grab some grub! Enjoy dinner with fellow attendees at the hotel restaurant.

title: Giant Men Panel
description: Celebrating the burliest of the SizeCon community, check out this amazing panel all about towering hunks and share your questions with our Giant panelists!

title: The Boobs Show
description: Featuring Demora and other size talent, come enjoy the company of SizeCon's Breast Expansion loving crew at our interactive Role-Play event! Tips appreciated!

title: The Writers Workshop
description: In this panel, writers come together to discuss the art of creating size content through the written word. Share tips, give advice, and network with your favorite writers!

title: Gulliverian Café
description: Thirsty? Join us for an unforgettable Giant Man experience at our new and improved interactive Role-Play and Variety Cafe Show experience! Entry is free, so don't miss it! Complementary Tea or Coffee is available if you can convince our hunky staff of tall bois to even notice you.

title: Spanish Social 🌎
description: ¿Eres fanático de Gigantes, gente diminuto, expansión de pecho o otros fetiches? ¡Bueno, discuta con sus nuevos amigos en tu idioma!

title: Weight Gain Social
description: Consensual, intentional weight gain can be a hot button issue. Issues such as monetary the costs involved, lifestyle/health choices and social taboo all play a major role. Feeders, feedees, gainers, and anyone interested in discussing the ups and downs of the Weight Gain community are invited to join us for an hour long group discussion.

title: Micro Talks
description: Feeling inspired by the day? Have a short story or testimonial you want to give? Wanting to test out a TED talk related to size? Our MicroTalks is your chance to seize the mic and deliver a shortened TED inspired talk about size. All topics welcome! Be prepared to share a summary at the start of the event.

title: The Play Room ⚠️
description: Back again for 2023, Join us for a casual gathering where fantasy meets reality in SizeCon's Playroom - Go on get your roleplay on! Feel free to chitchat with your friends, humiliate your tiny submissive in front of everyone or both! Participation is optional. While some equipment maybe available for use, any personal items (i.e. ropes, toys, etc) must be provided by you. This is a clothing optional event.

title: Size Movie Riff
description: Attack of the 50 Foot Woman, riffed live by DanStanding and Praedatorius. One movie packed with Giantesses and jokes!

title: Virtual Hybrid Social
description: We have had a blast putting together online events over the past years since our last in person SizeCon, and we have had such a wonderful time meeting new folks. This social will be our chance to include and reconnect with those who can't make it all the way to NJ. This social will be an informal opportunity to say hi, meet some of the incredible folks who have contributed to our online spaces, and let those who can't join us in on some of the action!

title: Adult Swim⚠️
description: Kid's out of the pool - it's Adult Swim! While the convention floor is closed, the party continues at the Holiday Inn’s indoor pool and jacuzzi. Join this SizeCon attendee exclusive party where clothes are optional and respect for fellow attendees is mandatory. Please note: Masks are optional for this event.

title: Breakfast
description: Wake up with your Size fam and grab the most important meal of the day! Enjoy breakfast along with fellow attendees at the hotel restaurant.

title: Vendor Hall
description: Come and checkout the many amazing, unique and risqué goods sold by our talented creators and performers! Commission artists and talent alike, buy artwork and sizey products, and don’t forget to see what exciting services and demos are available!

title: Virtual Hybrid Social
description: We have had a blast putting together online events over the past years since our last in person SizeCon, and we have had such a wonderful time meeting new folks.  This social will be our chance to include and reconnect  with those who can't make it all the way to NJ.  This social will be an informal opportunity to say hi, meet some of the incredible folks who have contributed to our online spaces, and let those who can't join us in on some of the action!

title: Diversity in the Size Community
description: As our community grows (and shrinks… and expands…) more and more people are getting exposed to different forms of Size-based erotica. What does this mean for the future of the Size community? What is the role of the LGBTQ community within the things we love and what unique perspectives can we bring to the table? What can be done to reduce bullying in the community and to encourage women and minorities as creators? What stories would you like to share? Join us for a discussion that aims to give a spotlight to often overlooked folks in our community.

title: The Power Play Social
description: For those interested in and wanting to discuss BDSM, D/s relationships, etc. Come meet with other naughty kinksters and share your stories or learn more about the lifestyle.

title: Uneven & Extreme Size Social
description: Do you like beings who are the size of planets or microscopic tinies? Or how about people who grow  or shrink their certain body parts unevenly? If so, you're in good company! Come join us for a discussion on Uneven & Extreme Size!

description: Back by popular demand, enjoy a whole brand-new puzzle, brought to you by our puzzle master Scidram (a.k.a. Syrus Durham)! Who's willing to take a fantastic voyage and solve this oversized mystery? Can it be done in forty-five minutes before the reduction process reverts? Come to SizeCon 2023 and find out!

title: Producer Q & A Panel
description: Presented by Maxgrowth Productions.

title: Silver Social
description: This social is specifically for the wisests of Size Con attendees - Seniors, Boomers, and GenX'ers gather to discuss their personal Size experiences growing before the internet!

description: Take a break and grab some grub! Enjoy lunch with fellow attendees at the hotel restaurant.

description: Brought to you by Maxgrowth!

title: Shrinkin’ Ladies Café
description: Come and enjoy the company of Size Con's gradually dwindling crew at our new and improved interactive Role-Play and variety show experience - The show is free so don't miss it! We'll be serving complementary coffee and tea. Tips appreciated!

If you are not a size fan but here to support someone, stop by this social to speak with other folks who are also in relationships with a size partner or partners! Share experiences, tips, vent, etc. You are part of the community too, so feel free to participate in a casual, private setting, in a space just for you!

title: Neurodivergence Social
description: This is a space specifically for folks who identify as neurodivergent in any shape or form to come together and share the love of size.  We know there are so many of us and welcome you to come and connect with others!

title: Size History Panel
description: How did we as a community get here? Well, it's time you hear it straight from the lips of those who started it all!

title: Giant Men & Tiny Ladies Social
description: Whether romantic or domineering, Giant Men and Tiny ladies gather for a deep dive on what makes you tick!

title: Giantess & Tiny Men Social
description: Whether romantic or domineering, Giantess' and Tiny men gather for a deep dive on what makes you tick!

description: There’s treasure to be grabbed, monsters to tackle, and traps to avoid, but this time our party of adventurers is going to have to deal with a different scale of challenge. Back by popular demand, join some of the best GMs from within the Size community to roll some dice and see just how dangerous a few magic spells in the wrong hands can be! Spots do fill up, so we highly suggest to sign up before the event.

title: Closing Ceremony
description: A few parting words from the Size Con Crew. This is the time where we say goodbye and give thanks to our awesome guests and dedicated volunteers with a quick video presentation! Thank you all for another great convention!

title: Dinner
description: Take a break and grab some grub! Enjoy dinner with fellow attendees at the hotel restaurant.

title: City Destruction
description: More info coming soon!

title: Silent Auction Charity Event
description: Want to support a noble cause? Want to get some really awesome swag from some of your favorite artists and writers? Come fill out our silent charity auction form and do both at the same time! 100% of the proceeds from this event will be donated to the Human Rights Campaign. More information available at https://www.hrc.org/.

title: SizeCon Floor Closes
description: Thanks for another unforgettable year at SizeCon!
